00003 class Producer:
00004     def __init__(self, instanceName, className):
00005         self.instanceName=instanceName
00006         self.className=className
00007         self.parameters=dict()
00008     def printMe(self):
00009         printMe(self,"")
00010     def printMe(self,prex):
00011         print "%sProducer(%s of class %s)"%(prex,self.instanceName,self.className)
00012         if len(self.parameters)>0:
00013             print "%s Parameters:"%(prex)
00014             for k, v in self.parameters.items():
00015                 print prex,"  ",k," : ",v

00031 class Process:
00032     lastProcess=None
00033     
00034     def __init__(self, passName):
00035         self.passName=passName
00036         self.maxEvents=-1
00037         self.run=-1
00038         self.inputFiles=[]
00039         self.outputFiles=[]
00040         self.sequence=[]
00041         self.keep=[]
00042         self.libraries=[]
00043         Process.lastProcess=self
00044 
00045     def printMe(self):
00046         print "Process with pass name '%s'"%(self.passName)
00047         if (self.run>0): print " using run number %d"%(self.run)
00048         if (self.maxEvents>0): print " Maximum events to process: %d"%(self.maxEvents)
00049         else: " No limit on maximum events to process"
00050         print "Processor sequence:"
00051         for proc in self.sequence:
00052             proc.printMe("  ")
00053         if len(self.inputFiles) > 0:
00054             if len(self.outputFiles)==len(self.inputFiles):
00055                 print "Files:"
00056                 for i in range(0,len(self.inputFiles)):
00057                     print "   '%s' -> '%s'"%(self.inputFiles[i],self.outputFiles[i])
00058             else:
00059                 print "Input files:"
00060                 for afile in self.inputFiles:
00061                     print "   %s"%(afile)
00062                 if len(self.outputFiles) > 0:
00063                     print "Output file:", self.outputFiles[0]
00064         elif len(self.outputFiles) > 0:
00065             print "Output file:", self.outputFiles[0]
00066         if len(self.keep) > 0:
00067             print "Rules for keeping previous products:"
00068             for arule in self.keep:
00069                 print "   %s"%(afile)
00070         if len(self.libraries) > 0:
00071             print "Shared libraries to load:"
00072             for afile in self.libraries:
00073                 print "   %s"%(afile)
